mapper.select: select bd_no as bdNo, bd_title as title, bd_contents as contents, bd_writer as writer, bd_regdate as regdate, bd_hitcount as hitcount, em_no as emNo from board where bd_no=#{bdNo}
mapper.update: update board set bd_title=#{title}, bd_contents=#{contents} where bd_no=#{bdNo}
mapper.select: select re_no as reNo, bd_no as bdNo, re_contents as reContents, re_writer as reWriter, re_regdate as reRegdate from reply where bd_no=#{bdNo}
